lead_paragraph: When it was time for coffee, the newspaper director - a bit embarrassed - had to apologize to the guests assembled in his offices in Cartagena.
snippet: Stephen Ferry saw the magic realism of Gabriel García Márquez from his first hours in Colombia. Then, as Valerie Lapinski reports, he set out to photograph the source.

headline.main: Showcase: It Couldn't Be, but It Is

abstract: Stephen Ferry saw the magic realism of Gabriel García Márquez from his first hours in Colombia. Then, as Valerie Lapinski reports, he set out to photograph the source.
